Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 8

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
8A Thorpeness Almshouses 0940 – 0955
8B Aldringham Church 1000 – 1015
8C Aldringham Ogilvie Homes 1020 – 1040
8D Aldringham Mill Hill 1045 – 1100
8E Knodishall Mission Room 1105 – 1135
8F Friston Bus Shelter 1145 – 1200
8G Snape Village Hall 1210 – 1235
8H Sudbourne Bus Shelter 1350 – 1400
8I Orford Baron’s Meadow 1405 – 1425
8J Orford Market Square 1430 – 1545
